title: View and follow a public request
content:
This section describes the different methods to view and follow a public request in the Service Portal.

Note Public requests are visible for thirty days from the time they're closed.

Request list

  1. Click the portal menu at the top right of the page
  2. Click Requests.
    1. Click Public to display public requests.
    2. Click Following to display requests you are following.

Search

  1. Enter the details in the search box, and press Return.

  2. Select the appropriate item from the results, and click the link. The details are displayed.

  3. Click the Follow button to follow the request. You can see this button only on public requests.

Virtual agent support

  1. Click Request Support.
  2. Enter the details, and click Post.
  3. When the system finds a relevant public request, it's displayed as a possible solution.
